DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective cohort study use national register linkage data ( include prescription , inpatient , mortality , socioeconomic data ) . The study period May 29 , 2013 June 30 , 2015 . Patients follow start treatment ( index date ) death , exit database , end study period ( June 30 , 2015 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Adherence Apixaban Warfarin Patients With Arterial Fibrillation Real-world Setting Sweden
